mapper.insert: INSERT INTO update_log_changes ( id, update_log_id, type, title, description, category, sort_order, create_time, update_time, deleted ) VALUES ( #{item.id}, #{item.updateLogId}, #{item.type}, #{item.title}, #{item.description}, #{item.category}, #{item.sortOrder}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.deleted} )
